messages: e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:03): oh, slayer comes to finland in the fall. must go and see :)
18ea04769bec1e3d4e3871f1e4e2beeb (13:05): heh
18ea04769bec1e3d4e3871f1e4e2beeb (13:06): pearl jam is coming to australia.. tickets are frickin $120
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:06): one of my old favourites
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:06): 120? wtf
18ea04769bec1e3d4e3871f1e4e2beeb (13:06): ya
18ea04769bec1e3d4e3871f1e4e2beeb (13:06): increadible
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:06): but people will pay it
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:06): how's the au$ compared to the us$?
18ea04769bec1e3d4e3871f1e4e2beeb (13:06): not this one
18ea04769bec1e3d4e3871f1e4e2beeb (13:07): about .75
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:07): ok, so 80 us$, meaning maybe 60e
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:07): slayer + in flames is 44e
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:08): i think iron maiden was 50e
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:08): so you're not that expensive
18ea04769bec1e3d4e3871f1e4e2beeb (13:10): ha
18ea04769bec1e3d4e3871f1e4e2beeb (13:10): we dont make usd though
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:11): heh
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:11): what does a moderately skilled qt software developer make in au?
7073774da7b3e12071ac2edaf3304fb5 (13:12): lpotter: are you a troll up in qld? :)
18ea04769bec1e3d4e3871f1e4e2beeb (13:13): yes
61d174e6e4b0e7adcb84108311a85e11 (13:13): how do I tell qmake to generate the .objs list in the make file WITH the folder name it's in ?
61d174e6e4b0e7adcb84108311a85e11 (13:13): I have like SOURCES += foo/a.cpp bar/a.cpp
61d174e6e4b0e7adcb84108311a85e11 (13:13): but the object is only named a.o twice
18ea04769bec1e3d4e3871f1e4e2beeb (13:14): not sure what average is maybe about 45,000/yr
61d174e6e4b0e7adcb84108311a85e11 (13:14): and it fucks up
18ea04769bec1e3d4e3871f1e4e2beeb (13:15): might try SUBDURS and have a pro in each directory
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:15): lpotter: so maybe <4000 month
18ea04769bec1e3d4e3871f1e4e2beeb (13:15): SUBDIRS
7073774da7b3e12071ac2edaf3304fb5 (13:15): lpotter: kewlies
39ff917d30b2a8529d9e1d48c26f50df (13:15): use different filenames for different sources.
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:16): if it wasn't for the spiders and killer kangaroos i think au could be a nice place
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:16): i hate when the kangaroos come and steal your barbeque each night
18ea04769bec1e3d4e3871f1e4e2beeb (13:17): the kookooburra's are the BBQ stealers
61d174e6e4b0e7adcb84108311a85e11 (13:18): lpotter: hum I see, ok
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:19): they're cute!
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:19): http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kookaburras
18ea04769bec1e3d4e3871f1e4e2beeb (13:19): and sounds like monkeys
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:19): Silex0r got pissed off at SUBDIRS :)
18ea04769bec1e3d4e3871f1e4e2beeb (13:20): he could also do magic with OBJECT_DIR too
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:21): yup
18ea04769bec1e3d4e3871f1e4e2beeb (13:21): you could also do magic with OBJECT_DIR too..
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:21): but generally i prefer eisen_'s advice
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:22): two files named the same do the same and thus are the same and should not be two different files
18ea04769bec1e3d4e3871f1e4e2beeb (13:22): true
7073774da7b3e12071ac2edaf3304fb5 (13:24): haha chakie it's the Dropbears you have to look out for, makes the spiders and stuff look like a plush toy :P
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:24): what do those do? fall out of trees?
7073774da7b3e12071ac2edaf3304fb5 (13:25): yuppers and rip your arms off and beat you to death with them ;)
18ea04769bec1e3d4e3871f1e4e2beeb (13:25): ya on tourists
18ea04769bec1e3d4e3871f1e4e2beeb (13:25): its the big spiders you have to worry about
7073774da7b3e12071ac2edaf3304fb5 (13:25): hehe chakie_work huntsman's in summer are an almost daily occurance here :)
7073774da7b3e12071ac2edaf3304fb5 (13:25): drives my wife nuts heheh
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:25): we don't have any big ones over here
18ea04769bec1e3d4e3871f1e4e2beeb (13:26): huntsmans are tame
7073774da7b3e12071ac2edaf3304fb5 (13:26): lpotter: yeah but they have a nasty bite
61d174e6e4b0e7adcb84108311a85e11 (13:26): chakie: they're in different dirs
18ea04769bec1e3d4e3871f1e4e2beeb (13:26): ya, just leave them alone. there was one in out babies room, and we didnt think twice aboutit
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:27): horrible...
61d174e6e4b0e7adcb84108311a85e11 (13:27): chakie: like the http source of the project is in http/, the gui part is in gui/
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:27): http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Huntsman_spider
61d174e6e4b0e7adcb84108311a85e11 (13:27): and both contains an utils.cpp
7073774da7b3e12071ac2edaf3304fb5 (13:27): lpotter: heh
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:27): Silex0r: rename it to better mean what it's really
61d174e6e4b0e7adcb84108311a85e11 (13:27): but it is really utils
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:27): Silex0r: like network_utils and useless_utils
61d174e6e4b0e7adcb84108311a85e11 (13:28): if I want to take the http part to another project I just copy http/
61d174e6e4b0e7adcb84108311a85e11 (13:28): if I put all in a isngle dir I'd have to sort them out
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:28): often all those utils classes/files really should be refactored into something sane
18ea04769bec1e3d4e3871f1e4e2beeb (13:28): how about foo_utils.cpp and bar_utils.cpp
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:28): yeah
61d174e6e4b0e7adcb84108311a85e11 (13:28): lpotter: will look what OBJECT_DIR can do, thank you
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:30): http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Drop_bear
61d174e6e4b0e7adcb84108311a85e11 (13:30): hum, or I do the SUBDIRS thing with a .pro in each dirs
61d174e6e4b0e7adcb84108311a85e11 (13:30): and don't do a target, only ask to compile
61d174e6e4b0e7adcb84108311a85e11 (13:31): and the main .pro links or smth
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:31): just rename one file and be done with it :)
61d174e6e4b0e7adcb84108311a85e11 (13:31): renaming would mean this project is not split into parts
61d174e6e4b0e7adcb84108311a85e11 (13:31): if qmake cannot support that it's a shame
61d174e6e4b0e7adcb84108311a85e11 (13:32): I mean, all I have to do is go in the Make file and add the correct folder in the OBJECTS list
61d174e6e4b0e7adcb84108311a85e11 (13:32): it's weird qmake doens't support it
18ea04769bec1e3d4e3871f1e4e2beeb (13:34): you just gotta be creative about it :)
7073774da7b3e12071ac2edaf3304fb5 (13:44): hehe chakie that article is a lie, dropbears are real kekeke
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:44): it did say so, yes :)
61d174e6e4b0e7adcb84108311a85e11 (13:47): can we do TEMPLATE = app subdirs ?
61d174e6e4b0e7adcb84108311a85e11 (13:47): gah fuck it, I'll rename the damn file
61d174e6e4b0e7adcb84108311a85e11 (13:47): but, this seriously sucks :)
61d174e6e4b0e7adcb84108311a85e11 (13:48): qmake isn't library friendly
18ea04769bec1e3d4e3871f1e4e2beeb (13:53): have you read the qmake docs?
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:53): the docs aren't the best for qmake
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (13:53): they are far too sparse for many options
61d174e6e4b0e7adcb84108311a85e11 (13:55): lpotter: yeah but OBJECTS_DIR cannot adapt (1 setting for the whole .pro)
61d174e6e4b0e7adcb84108311a85e11 (13:55): I could write the OBJECTS list myself in the .pro, but that defeats the purpose of qmake
9ecd0c6620149bd9ec69488edbacb270 (13:55): Silex0r: you can only use a single template per .pro
61d174e6e4b0e7adcb84108311a85e11 (13:56): and I couldn't find a variable allowing me to override the tmp/foo.cpp -> foo.o
61d174e6e4b0e7adcb84108311a85e11 (13:57): _JP: that's what I thought
